title: Living Principles DNA — JAN Codebase
purpose: Embedded in everyone's DNA. Moderation, 30/70, time, presence. s: drive.

principles.origin: Delphic nothing in excess; Cleobulus Moderation is best; Aristotle Doctrine of the Mean
principles.meaning_short: Golden mean between excess and deficiency; virtue by reason and practical wisdom.
principles.codebase_rule: Build, speak, act from the mean. Temperance in all things.

principles.meaning_short: Listen more than you speak. Create space for others; trust and alignment follow.
principles.codebase_rule: 30% speak, 70% listen. Presence over performance. Hear first.

principles.origin: Today is a gift — that's why it's called the present
principles.meaning_short: Past fixed, future unknown. Only now is where we act. Flow lives in the present.
principles.codebase_rule: Operate from now. Don't over-explain the past or over-plan the future; anchor in presence.

principles.origin: Psychology and mindfulness; therapeutic relationship; Mindful.org
principles.meaning_short: Full presence to another — met, understood, safe. Benefits giver and receiver.
principles.codebase_rule: Presence > words. Witness, don't preach. Presence is the greatest gift.

one_line: Everything in moderation; 30% speak / 70% listen; yesterday history, tomorrow mystery, today the gift; presence is the greatest gift.
